description.value:
Restriction: The vampire's coffin must be established.

Trigger: You would die due to failing Void Survival.

Effect: The Vampire turns to mist. They can take move actions towards their coffin even though they are at 0 HP. While at 0 HP in this form, the vampire is unaffected by further damage. They automatically return to their corporeal form, unconscious, if they reach their coffin or after 2 hours, whichever comes first.

You return at 1 HP and add 3 Drained to your current Hunger and the drained value immediately begins to increase each day as outlined in Vampire Ancestry.
